rpgonline.sky

Interface SkyLayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChangingColorLayer, ColorLayer, ImageLayer, ImageMeshLayer, MoonLayer, MultiSkyLayer, ParallaxLayer, SunLayer, ThreeImageMesh, TimeParallax

    public interface SkyLayer
    An interface for classes that allow a sky to be rendered.
    Author:
    Tomas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g, org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer c, double x, double y, double z, World world, org.newdawn.slick.Color light)
      Renders the sky.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
            org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer c,
            double x,
            double y,
            double z,
            World world,
            org.newdawn.slick.Color light)
        Renders the sky.
        Parameters:
        g - The current graphics context.
        c - The current game container.
        x - The player X position.
        y - The player Y position.
        z - The player Z position.
        world - The current world.
        light - The current sky light.
